userToken - Class in shared.communication
a userToken encapsulates the user data relevant to authentication; it keeps the password and username secret during transmission from client to server, and the server can only check if a username/password combination is correct; the password submitted is hidden from the server.
userToken(String, String) - Constructor for class shared.communication.userToken
Construct a userToken
